results.scenarioName: GIVEN- the GitHub REST end point, WHEN- I invoke GET, THEN- I will receive the 200 status with body

steps.assertions:
Assumed Payload: 
{
  "status" : 200,
  "body" : {
    "name" : "morpheus",
    "job" : "leader",
    "id" : "245",
    "createdAt" : "2020-07-22T05:51:47.926Z"
  }
}
Assertion Errors: 
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.job' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value 'leader'
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.id' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value '245'
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.name' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value 'morpheus'
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.createdAt' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value '2020-07-22T05:51:47.926Z'
